title: Trinity - The Prophecy
description: Trinity, Nikkee, and Sky had been best friends since they were in grade five. Nothing seemed to tear them apart. That was until Trinity's eighteenth birthday. It was supposed to be a milestone, an accomplishment. But for Trinity time was running out. A prophecy foretold that she would be scratched by beast, bitten by monster and she must choose a side before the next full moon. Many questions arise as she discovers her destiny is chosen for her. Will her friends stick by her side? Which side will she pick? Can she change her own destiny? If so, what happens to everyone else if she makes the wrong decision?
author: Kylie Price
